name: personal-management-system
description: Personal Management System is a self-hosted platform that helps track tasks, expenses, plans, and timesheets. It includes a customizable UI for managing personal productivity and goals.
features: Task Management: Create, organize, and track tasks with priorities, due dates, and completion status for personal productivity.
Expense Tracking: Log and categorize expenses with detailed records to monitor spending and manage personal finances.
Goal Planning: Set and track personal goals with milestones and progress indicators to maintain motivation and accountability.
Timesheet Management: Record work hours and activities with timesheet functionality for freelancers or personal time tracking.
Note Taking: Store notes, ideas, and information with organization tools for personal knowledge management.
File Storage: Upload and organize personal documents and files with categorization and search capabilities.
Custom Dashboard: Personalize the interface with widgets and layouts that display the information most relevant to you.
Calendar Integration: View tasks, goals, and events on a unified calendar for comprehensive schedule management.
Data Privacy: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over personal data without third-party access.
Backup and Export: Export data in various formats for backup or migration to other systems.
Password Manager: Store and encrypt passwords with secure access for managing credentials across services.
Contact Management: Maintain a personal address book with contact details, notes, and relationship tracking.
